name: OgawaAiMasterDrive
0:
”Alexa start master drive”
”Power on”
”Give me a massage”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: master drive
des:
The Ogawa Ai Master Drive is an innovative, one-of-a-kind, healing experience that scans your body to determine the best massage for your individual needs. The Ogawa Ai Master Drive App allows you to control the chair with a simple touch. Ogawa Ai Master Drive uses an exclusive Chair Doctor technology with sensors to measure the tension in your body and prescribes a specialized massage based on the results. We also offer a choice of thirteen pre-programmed massage and a calendar that keeps a record of your tension score results.

With the download of the Ogawa Ai Master Drive app you will have access to the vast number of unique massage features in a massage chair:

Chair Doctor technology measures the tension from your body and prescribes the perfect de-stress Vario Motion Massage treatment/programs

Choice of 21 exclusive COZZIA preprogrammed massages

Calendar keeps records of your tension score results

Blue tooth connection to your music library and led light chroma-therapy 

Full control of Vario Motion 4D Massage Nodes (world’s most human like mechanism)
